project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Productive Partnerships Support Project for Colombia is to generate income, create employment, and promote social cohesion of poor rural communities in an economic and environmentally sustainable manner through the development and implementation of a demand-driven, productive partnership scheme with the private sector. There are two main project components. The first component finances technical assistance and training for activities associated with information sharing, mobilization and screening of interest, pre-investments, ex-ante evaluation of detailed productive partnership sub-project proposals, and studies. The second component supports the implementation of productive partnerships by financing 1) cost sharing transfers as a financial incentive for participating small farmers producer organizations; and 2) technical assistance and training to productive partnership participants. The third component, project management, includes the operation of a management information system, and the design and implementation of monitoring, evaluation, and learning arrangements.
